definition: through transport/through traffic jointly organized by different enterprises
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: L2. Due to the destination is an inland city, we have to arrange sea-land intermodal transportation.
sentences.chinese: 由于目的地是内陆城市，我们只好安排海陆联运。

sentences.english: With the formation of industrial clusters, inland cities will be encouraged to open international passenger and cargo air routes, and develop multimodal transportation.
sentences.chinese: 支持内陆城市增开国际客货运航线，发展多式联运。

sentences.english: Buy international business and first class fares from consolidators.
sentences.chinese: 在联运公司购买国际航班的商务舱和头等舱机票。

sentences.english: "We're running our intermodal trains 95 percent on time, " Lanigan said.
sentences.chinese: 我们多式联运列车运行时间达到了95%。

sentences.english: The two sides agreed to employ "combined transportation" to ship the goods.
I don't like this kind of combined transportation.
sentences.chinese: 我并不喜欢这种联运方式。

sentences.english: Transshipment is allowed provided“Through Bill of Lading” are presented.
sentences.chinese: 如提交联运提单，转运允许。

sentences.english: Especially in multimodal transport, the transport chain is usually containerized.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是多式联运，运输链通常是集装箱化的。

sentences.english: Finally, a few development ideas are made to the development of the Virtual Multi-modal transport Enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 最后对发展虚拟多式联运企业提出几点发展思路。

sentences.english: Along with the development of our country economy, Intermodal Transportation has a bright future.
sentences.chinese: 随着我国经济的发展，联运有着可观的前景。

sentences.english: But general inter-modal systems are structured around the use of containers.
sentences.chinese: 但一般多式联运系统都围绕着集装箱应用而构建的。

sentences.english: It's simpler and cheaper for both of us to arrange multimodal combined transport.
sentences.chinese: 安排联运对我们双方都既简单又经济。

sentences.english: The constitutions of the international multi-transport influent the whole system.
sentences.chinese: 第六节是对国际多式联运系统的结构协调研究。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the principles and illustrations of the cooperated main pumps and auxillaries.
sentences.chinese: 介绍废水泵联运增效原理方法和实例。

sentences.english: If the goods are to be transshipped from one means of transportation to another during the course of the entire voyage，it'scalled “combined transport”。
sentences.chinese: 如果货物在运输途中交换交通工具，这便是“联运”。

sentences.english: In the usa and canada , rail dominates inter - modal transport.
sentences.chinese: 在美国和加拿大，铁路是多式联运的主要形式。

definition: to be in operation/to do business/(of train, bus etc) to be in service/operation/service
regular passenger or cargo ship/regular steamship service
